name: GitHub Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 GitHub Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume GitHub API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume GitHub API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: issue
available_options: File (值: file)
Issue (值: issue)
Organization (值: organization)
Release (值: release)
Repository (值: repository)
Review (值: review)
User (值: user)
Workflow (值: workflow)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: dispatch
available_options: Disable (值: disable) - Disable a workflow
Dispatch (值: dispatch) - Dispatch a workflow event
Dispatch and Wait for Completion (值: dispatchAndWait) - Dispatch a workflow event and wait for a webhook to be called before proceeding
Enable (值: enable) - Enable a workflow
Get (值: get) - Get a workflow
Get Usage (值: getUsage) - Get the usage of a workflow
List (值: list) - List workflows
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

webhookNotice.displayName: Your execution will pause until a webhook is called. This URL will be generated at runtime and passed to your Github workflow as a resumeUrl input.
webhookNotice.name: webhookNotice
webhookNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Your execution will pause until a webhook is called. This URL will be generated at runtime and passed to your Github workflow as a resumeUrl input.

owner.name: owner
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Owner | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

repository.name: repository
repository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Name | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

workflowId.name: workflowId
workflowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow | 作用: The workflow to dispatch | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

ref.name: ref
ref.description: The git reference for the workflow dispatch (branch, tag, or commit SHA)
ref.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ref | 作用: The git reference for the workflow dispatch (branch, tag, or commit SHA) | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

inputs.name: inputs
inputs.description: JSON object with input parameters for the workflow
inputs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs | 作用: JSON object with input parameters for the workflow | 默认值: {}

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.description: The path of the folder to list
filePath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Path | 作用: The path of the folder to list

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

commitMessage.name: commitMessage
commitMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Commit Message | (必填项)

additionalParameters.name: additionalParameters
additionalParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Parameters | 作用: Additional fields to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: reference (值: None) - The name of the commit/branch/tag. Default: the repository’s default branch (usually master).

asBinaryProperty.name: asBinaryProperty
asBinaryProperty.description: Whether to set the data of the file as binary property instead of returning the raw API response
asBinaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: As Binary Property | 作用: Whether to set the data of the file as binary property instead of returning the raw API response | 默认值: True

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the issue | (必填项)

body.name: body
body.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: The body of the review

labels.name: labels
labels.natural_language_description: 参数名: Labels | 默认值: {'label': ''}
available_options: label (值: None) - Label to add to issue

assignees.name: assignees
assignees.natural_language_description: 参数名: Assignees | 默认值: {'assignee': ''}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - User to assign issue too

issueNumber.name: issueNumber
issueNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Number | 作用: The issue number to lock | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

editFields.name: editFields
editFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Edit Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignees (值: None)
body (值: None) - The body of the issue
labels (值: None)
state (值: None) - The state to set
state_reason (值: None) - The reason for the state change
title (值: None) - The title of the issue

lockReason.name: lockReason
lockReason.description: The reason for locking the issue
lockReason.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lock Reason | 作用: The reason for locking the issue | 默认值: resolved
available_options: Off-Topic (值: off-topic) - The issue is Off-Topic
Too Heated (值: too heated) - The discussion is too heated
Resolved (值: resolved) - The issue got resolved
Spam (值: spam) - The issue is spam

releaseTag.name: releaseTag
releaseTag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag | 作用: The tag of the release | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: commitId (值: None) - The SHA of the commit that needs a review, if different from the latest

release_id.name: release_id
release_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Release ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

getRepositoryIssuesFilters.name: getRepositoryIssuesFilters
getRepositoryIssuesFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - Return only issues which are assigned to a specific user
creator (值: None) - Return only issues which were created by a specific user
mentioned (值: None) - Return only issues in which a specific user was mentioned
labels (值: None) - Return only issues with the given labels. Multiple labels can be separated by comma.
since (值: None) - Return only issues updated at or after this time
state (值: None) - The state to set
sort (值: None) - The order the issues should be returned in
direction (值: None) - The sort order

getRepositoryPullRequestsFilters.name: getRepositoryPullRequestsFilters
getRepositoryPullRequestsFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: state (值: None) - The state to set
sort (值: None) - The order the pull requests should be returned in
direction (值: None) - The sort order

pullRequestNumber.name: pullRequestNumber
pullRequestNumber.description: The number of the pull request to review
pullRequestNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: PR Number | 作用: The number of the pull request to review | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

reviewId.name: reviewId
reviewId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Review ID | 作用: ID of the review | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.description: The review action you want to perform
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 作用: The review action you want to perform | 默认值: approve
available_options: Approve (值: approve) - Approve the pull request
Request Change (值: requestChanges) - Request code changes
Comment (值: comment) - Add a comment without approval or change requests
Pending (值: pending) - You will need to submit the pull request review when you are ready

organization.name: organization
organization.description: The GitHub organization that the user is being invited to
organization.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization | 作用: The GitHub organization that the user is being invited to | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of the invited user
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address of the invited user | (必填项)

getUserIssuesFilters.name: getUserIssuesFilters
getUserIssuesFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: mentioned (值: None) - Return only issues in which a specific user was mentioned
labels (值: None) - Return only issues with the given labels. Multiple labels can be separated by comma.
since (值: None) - Return only issues updated at or after this time
state (值: None) - The state to set
sort (值: None) - The order the issues should be returned in
direction (值: None) - The sort order
